div.p: The local population occupation duration. The figure shows the number of time steps a given population was occupied during the 100‚Äêyear period. The mean of all replications, along with the std. average, and the minimum and maximum values are provided. The different scenarios are as follows: (a) Low initial population size, mean survival. (b) High initial population size, mean survival. (c) Low initial population size, high survival. (d) High initial population size, high survival. (e) Low initial population size, low survival. (f) High initial population size, low survival
